bundling_howto_modal.description_step_one: Use the upload button on your product bundle allows you to add a file for that specific item.
bundling_howto_modal.description_step_two: After uploading your file, make any necessary configurations and select Add to Cart to be returned to your bundle.
bundling_howto_modal.description_step_three: Repeat this process for each item in your bundle to access the bundle discount. Once completed, you can check out as usual.
